CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Test Signature
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If ticked, a test signature is used instead of a real mobile phone signature.

EditTextPreference.android:title: TTP Server URL
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Specifies the URL where the TTP API is accessable. For an GAE hosted TTP use a URL in the form of "applicationname.appsopt.com", for a GWT Development Server URL use a URL like "10.0.0.1:8888".

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, the TAN received by SMS is captured automatically without any user intervention required.
